UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Systematic Mutagenesis of Oncocin Reveals Enhanced Activity and Insights into the Mechanisms of Antimicrobial Activity.
Literature.Author: Lai PK, Geldart K, Ritter S, Kaznessis YN, Hackel BJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli JW0013(MIC=0.83±0.42µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=2.40±0.56µg/ml),Escherichia coli MC1061(MIC=0.15±0.03µg/ml),Escherichia coli J2210(MIC=0.30±0.07µg/ml),Escherichia coli JJ2487(MIC=0.39±0.18µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis MH91989(MIC=0.39±0.18µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(MIC=0.39±0.18µg/ml)
